document.docAuthor: Mantelatto, Fernando L., Tamburus, Ana Francisca, Magalhães, Tatiana, Buranelli, Raquel C., Terossi, Mariana, Negri, Mariana, Castilho, Antonio L., Costa, Rogério C. & Zara, Fernando J.
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of decapod crustaceans from the coast of the São Paulo state (Brazil) supported by integrative molecular and morphological data: III. Infraorder Brachyura Latreille, 1802

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of decapod crustaceans from the coast of the São Paulo state (Brazil) supported by integrative molecular and morphological data: III. Infraorder Brachyura Latreille, 1802

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
Brazil , São Paulo : 2 ♂ , 3 ♀ ( 2 ♀ ov), CCDB 1860 , Ubatuba , Rio Escuro mangrove, colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
05.iv.2011
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 3913 , Ubatuba , Rio Escuro mangrove, coll. F. Mantelatto ,
22.iv.2012
;
2 ♂ , CCDB 3916 , Ubatuba , Rio Escuro mangrove, coll. F. Mantelatto ,
23.iv.2012
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 4966 , Bertioga , Rio Itapanhau mangrove, colls. R . Buranelli & L. Cerantola ,
13.iv.2014
;
1 ♂ , MZUSP 12241 , Cubatão , coll. R . Silva ,
30.xi.1996
;
2 ♂ , CCDB 2962 , Guarujá , Bairro Cachoeira , colls. N. Rossi et al. ,
24.x.2011
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 3777 , Cananéia , IO / USP , colls. R . Robles & F. Mantelatto ,
10.iii.2012
;
1 ♀ ov, CCDB 3217 , Cananéia , Rio Bragança estuary, colls. R . Costa et al. ,
17.iv.2011
;
1 ♂ , 4 ♀ , CCDB 746 , Cananéia , estuary, colls. R . Costa et al. ,
30.viii.2011
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 785 , Ilha Comprida , beach near ferry station to Cananéia , colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
30.viii.2011
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 3778 , Ilha Comprida , beach near ferry station to Cananéia , colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
11.iii.2012
.

Remarks. Previous records to São Paulo state include Iguape ( Rathbun 1918 ) and Ubatuba (
Fransozo et al. 1998
;
Negreiros-Fransozo et al. 2002
). This species was once recorded for eastern Atlantic, from Senegal to northern Angola ( Chace & Hobbs 1969 ; Melo 1996 ), before the resurrection of
Goniopsis pelii
from the synonymy of
G. cruentata ( Manning & Holthuis 1981 )
. The genus
Goniopsis de Haan (1833)
holds an external position along the studied Grapsidae members (
Ip et al. 2015
), being represented by three recognized species that are differentiated mostly based on color patterns ( Manning & Holthuis 1981 ; Von Sternberg 1994 ; Schubart 2011 ). Sequences accession number (GenBank): CCDB 3916—16S ( KU313124 ), COI ( KU313325 ) (
Mantelatto et al. 2018a
).
